import React from 'react' import ingredientStyles from './ingredient.module.css' import { Typography } from '@ya.praktikum/react-developer-burger-ui-components' import { CurrencyIcon } from '@ya.praktikum/react-developer-burger-ui-components' import { Counter } from '@ya.praktikum/react-developer-burger-ui-components' import IngredientDetails from '../ingredientDetails/ingredientDetails' function Ingredient({ ingr, setIsModalOpen, setCardData, setModalConten}) { const onClick = () => { setIsModalOpen(true) setCardData(ingr) setModalConten() } return (

{ingr.price}

{ingr.name}

 ) } export default Ingredient
